description: Saionji tests an experimental aphrodisiac on his female colleagues and finds a chance to snatch his boss` girl from him!

titles.title: New Drug Testing! Office Ladies High on Aphrodisiacs - Getting the Female Boss Laid
Shinyaku Jikken! Biyaku ni Oboreru OL-tachi: Joushi no Onna o Itadaki Da!
新薬実験! 媚薬に溺れるOL達 上司の女を戴きだ!
